title: Realbotix makes transition from novelty to embodied AI
description:
Realbotix, which showed its humanoids at CES 2026, illustrates how technology can mature past adult entertainment, writes columnist Oliver Mitchell.

The post Realbotix makes transition from novelty to embodied AI appeared first on The Robot Report.
